safetyTips: Goods are delivered socially distanced by bicycle.
name: Persepolis To Go
description: Legendary middle eastern vegetarian restaurant, and cornershop cornucopia of wacky ingredients and pantry staples. Now offering meal deals, veg boxes, pantry staples and recipe bundles by bicycle delivery, for £3.00. Delivering 6 – 9 pm only. And you will need to get your orders in between midday and 5 pm. P.S. If you want to buy a basket of stuff from the main website, please call up with your order and they will take payment over the phone.
